Body: Draedon's labs have published groundbreaking research on mana's fundamental nature. Their findings reveal mana isn't merely energy but 'condensed sentience' from the collapse of dying stars; the very same known to result in the Astral Infection. By exposing mana flowers to controlled Brimstone flames, researchers observed temporary sentient behaviorâ€”including avoidance of hostile stimuli. Critics warn this could explain why mages report 'whispers' during prolonged spellcasting.
